title: 3 Years Of ADHM, FRIENDS Cast Is 'Working On Something' Together & More From Ent
text:
3 Years Of ADHM, FRIENDS Cast Is 'Working On Something' Together & More From Ent

3 Years Of ADHM, FRIENDS Cast Is 'Working On Something' Together & More From Ent

“Listen, we would love for there to be something, but we don’t know what that something is. So we’re just trying. We’re working on something.”

2. Three Years Of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil: Karan Johar’s Golden Tribute To One-Sided Lovers Still Has Our Heart

Have you ever experienced one-sided love? Have you ever gone through a feeling where in you felt that despite giving your all, sometimes it's still not enough. Three years ago, Karan Johar made a movie, which he says is close to his heart, on unrequited love and all one-sided lovers felt the pain that Ranbir’s character went through in the movie.

3. 7 Times Angry Salman Khan Threatened To Leave Bigg Boss But Thankfully Decided Against It!

Don't Miss 300 SHARES 338 SHARES 326 SHARES 1.3 K SHARES

The only thing constant for the past one decade is Salman Khan. He has been witnessing the highs and lows that the show has to offer. And being the A-lister he is, Salman Khan does reach a point where he can't deal with the Bigg Boss contestants.

4. Indian Man Designs Iron Man-Inspired Suit, People Are In Splits Seeing 'Sasta Tony Stark'

In a video shared by RT on Twitter, a man can be seen wearing a metallic green Iron Man-inspired suit. If you’ll notice carefully, there are fire weapons on the hand, shoulder as well as belly.

5. Moviegoers Called ‘Pakistani Terrorists’ For Not Standing Up During National Anthem In Theatre

Four people who went to watch Dhanush-starrer Tamil movie Asuran at a movie theatre in Bengaluru were forced to leave during the intermission for all they did was not stand up during the national anthem.
